main event: A balloon approximately 50 feet in diameter and 200 feet long was observed and subsequently shot down in Tanana, Alaska.
interesting points: The balloon had a box-shaped structure and measured about 35 feet from top to bottom., It was visible for about 1 minute before being shot down., There were indications that the balloon was affected by another Y-shaped object in the area., The balloon's altitude was estimated between 25,000 and 30,000 feet., The source and exact purpose of the balloon cannot be determined until it is recovered.
